scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: (if exist node_modules rmdir node_modules /q /s) && (if exist dist rmdir dist /q /s) && (if exist package-lock.json del -f -q package-lock.json) && (if exist tsc del -f -q tsc) && (if exist tsc.cmd del -f -q tsc.cmd) && (if exist tsserver del -f -q tsserver) && (if exist tsserver.cmd del -f -q tsserver.cmd)
